timeline.message:
adding a junit test rule allowing to modify env settings

This is useful if testcases need to have different env settings. A nice way to declaratively test with different apoc settings.
fixes #1644 - support for db specific initializers

timeline.bodyText:
It's nice if you're deprecating things to add some info on what the replacement is:
e.g.
/**
     * @deprecated
     * This has been replaced by database-specific initialisers.
     * Use apoc.initializer.<database name> instead.
     */
timeline.author: eastlondoner

timeline.bodyText:
can we move this higher as a guard clause and just return from the method?
also can this whole collecting initializers go into a separate method?
timeline.author: jexp

replies.bodyText:
moving higher doesn't make a lot of sense IMO. We do want to execute initializers for any db (including system). Systemdb is just treated differently.
Collecting initializers is now in a separate method, see my commit below.
replies.author: sarmbruster

timeline.bodyText: what is an example of this?
timeline.author: jexp

replies.bodyText: when not having the retry strategy I found that an initializer of apoc.initializer.system=create user dummy set password 'abc' resulted in a transaction failed since a concurrent transaction was setting up a constraint.
replies.author: sarmbruster
